name: Github Grey Style
description: A grey github style made for github. I spent a lot of hours on this, it should be perfect, but if you see anything weird please PM me in a server such as Origin.
additional_info:
To see this stylesheet download Stylish and add this style, and then load Pokemon showdown. 
Updates:

    3ʳᵈ April 2015:
      - code hiighlights fixed
      - some pull request element greyed

    4ᵗʰ April 2015:
      - pull request list list item fix

    5ᵗʰ April 2015:
      - li focuses fixed

    20ᵗʰ August 2015:
      - background fixed
